bug.author: nsubiron
bug.description:
Navmesh fails to recalculate well at runtime.
Cars leave a trace of "holes" in the navmesh, pedestrians cannot enter this holes and follow weird paths to cross the road. Navmesh fails to update a tile even though half of the vehicle lies inside the tile. Pedestrians see this part as walkable, when they try to cross they crash against the car and die.

comments.comment: No longer relevant as pedestrians no longer use the navmesh.
